articles.author: AAP
articles.title: Australia's middle-order trio makes ICC rankings history - cricket.com.au
articles.description: For the first time since 1984, the world's top three Test batters - according to the ICC player ratings - are from the same country
articles.content:
'I'm going to try and take him on': Brook sizes up Lyon battle
Australia will officially enter the Ashes with the best three batsmen in the world, after becoming the first side in almost four decade… [+3151 chars]
